ModMetaData.name: Miscellaneous 'CORE'
ModMetaData.author: Haplo
ModMetaData.description:
This contains various core functions for other Miscellaneous parts. It must be loaded before the other parts!
It also comes with the following functions/items: -Colonist Keys: Place/Group This allows you to use the keys 6, 7, 8, 9 to create teams The key 0 releases all drafted colonists, BACKSPACE jumps randomly into your colony (Note: This needs a new colony to work; the keys can be reconfigured) -BrainPals Some brain implants to enhance your colonists (an idea from 'Old Mans War')
(Version: 0.13.1)
